author: Sarah Perez
title: Pinterest adds new ‘Shop’ tabs connected to in-stock inventory, style guides and more
description: Given the rise in online shopping attributed to the coronavirus outbreak which has forced consumers to stay home from stores, Pinterest today is launching a new way to shop on its platform. Now, Pinterest users will be able to browse in-stock inventory from n…
